attributes.action: change the rules regarding Keyworker status to include officers from Her Majesties Coast Guard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Officers from HM Coastguard coordinate many thousands of incidents saving many lives every year for a very low level of pay.

Whilst some personnel are lucky enough to receive a military Service pension, many, who join form other avenues are expected to live and work on or below the breadline, with no assistance from the government. All other category 1 civil contingeny responders are included in the scheme, so why not coastguards?

We, the undersigned, hereby request that the Prime minister changes the rules on Keyworker status to include employees of HM Coastguard (MCA).
